Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Moseyai Nokki: Neeyum Aaronum Naadhaabum Abiyoovum Isravelin Moopparil Ezhuvadhuperum Karththaridaththil Erivandhu, Dhooraththilirundhu Panindhukollungal.
2 mose Maaththiram Karththaridaththil Sameebiththu Varalaam; Avargal Sameebiththu Varalaagaadhu; Janangal Avanodekooda Erivaravendaam Endraar.

3 mose Vandhu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigal Yaavaiyum Niyaayangal Yaavaiyum Janangalukku Ariviththaan. Appozhudhu Janangalellaarum Egasaththamaai: Karththar Arulina Ellaa Vaarththaigalinbadiyum Seyvom Endru Piradhiyuththaram Sonnaargal.

4 mose Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Ezhudhivaiththu, Adhikaalame Ezhundhu, Malaiyin Adiyil Oru Balibeedaththaik Katti, Israveludaiya Pannirandu Koththirangaludaiya Lakkaththinbadiye Pannirandu Thoongalai Niruththinaan.
5 isravel Puththirarin Vaalibarai Anuppinaan; Avargal Sarvaanga Thaganabaligalaich Seluththi, Karththarukkuch Samaadhaanabaligalaagak Kaalaigalaip Baliyittaargal.
6 appozhudhu Mose Andha Raththaththil Paadhi Eduththu, Paaththirangalil Vaarththu, Paadhi Raththaththaip Balibeedaththinmel Theliththu,
7 udanbadikkaiyin Pusthagaththai Eduththu, Janangalin Kaadhuketka Vaasiththaan; Avargal Karththar Sonnabadiyellaam Seydhu, Keezhppadindhu Nadappom Endraargal.
8 appozhudhu Mose Raththaththai Eduththu, Janangalinmel Theliththu, Indha Vaarththaigal Yaavaiyunguriththu Karththar Ungalode Pannina Udanbadikkaiyin Raththam Idhuve Endraan.
9 pinbu Moseyum Aaronum Naadhaabum Abiyoovum, Isravelarudaiya Moopparil Ezhuvadhuperum Erippoi,
10 isravelin Dhevanaith Tharisiththaargal. Avarudaiya Paadhaththinkeezhe Neelakkallizhaiththa Velaikku Oppaagavum Thelindha Vaanaththin Pirapaikku Oppaagavum Irundhadhu.
11 avar Isravel Puththirarudaiya Adhibadhigalmel Thammudaiya Kaiyai Neettavillai; Avargal Dhevanaith Dharisiththu, Pinbu Pusiththuk Kudiththaargal.

12 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Malaiyinmel Ennidaththirku Erivandhu, Ange Iru; Naan Unakkuk Karpalaaigalaiyum, Nee Avargalukku Ubadhesippadharku, Naan Ezhudhina Niyaayappiramaanaththaiyum Karpanaigalaiyum Koduppen Endraar.
13 appozhudhu Mose Than Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Yosuvaavode Ezhundhu Ponaan. Mose Dheva Parvadhaththil Erippogaiyil,

14 avan Moopparai Nokki: Naangal Ungalidaththil Thirumbivarumattum, Neengal Inge Engalukkaagak Kaaththirungal; Aaronum Oorum Ungalidaththil Irukkiraargal; Oruvanukku Yaadhoru Kaariyam Undaanaal, Avan Avargalidaththil Pogalaam Endraan.
15 mose Malaiyinmel Erinapodhu, Oru Megam Malaiyai Mooditru.
16 karththarudaiya Magimai Seenaaimalaiyinmel Thangiyirundhadhu; Megam Aaru Naal Adhai Moodiyirundhadhu; Ezhaam Naalil Avar Megaththin Naduvilirundhu Moseyaik Kooppittaar.
17 malaiyin Kodumudiyile Karththarudaiya Magimaiyin Kaatchi Isravel Puththirarudaiya Kangalukkup Patchikkira Akkiniyaippol Irundhadhu.
18 mose Megaththin Naduvile Piravesiththu, Malaiyinmel Eri, Iravum Pagalum Naarpadhunaal Malaiyil Irundhaan.
